body: Any faults in the system observed during the visit?
If yes, was an immediate fix implemented?
If yes, were any parts repaired?
If yes, and further rectification is needed, did you inform the health staff or CRM to raise a ticket through Saura-eMitra?

content.text: Images to be captured during the scheduled maintenance visit:

body: Please take a selfie in front of the name board of the health center
